com.mpos.lottery.te.merchant.service

接口 CreditService

  • 所有已知实现类:
    DefaultCreditService

    public interface CreditService
    Interfaces for managing sale and payout balance.

    • 方法概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • credit

        java.lang.Object credit(java.lang.String operatorId,
                      long merchantId,
                      java.math.BigDecimal amount,
                      java.lang.String gameId,
                      boolean isRestore,
                      boolean isSaleStyle,
                      boolean isSoldByCreditCard)
                        throws ApplicationException
        已过时。 Will be removed soon, replaced by BalanceService and CommissionBalanceService
        There are 2 kind of credit level: sale credit level and payout credit level.

        sale and sale cancellation will affect sale credit level, however there is a special case, if player pay by credit card and the amount will be collected by merchant's account, no sale credit level will be affected. Below illustrates the work flow of how sale(pay by cash) affects the sale credit level.

        Sale Credit Level

        1. Check the credit type of operator.
          - credit type is DEFINITIVE VALUE
          1. Simple deduct the operator's sale credit level and return
          - credit type is USE PARENT
          1. Go to check the credit type of parent merchent.
        2. Check the credit type of parent merchant if needed.
          - credit type is DEFINITIVE VALUE
          1. Simple deduct the merchant's sale credit level and return
          - credit type is USE PARENT
          1. Go to check the credit type of parent merchant until found a DEFINITIVE merchant.

        Payout Credit Level

        1. Check the credit type of operator.
          - credit type is DEFINITIVE VALUE
          1. Simple topup the operator's payout credit level and return
          - credit type is USE PARENT
          1. Go to check the credit type of parent merchent.
        2. Check the credit type of parent merchant if needed.
          - credit type is DEFINITIVE VALUE
          1. Simple topup the merchant's payout credit level and return
          - credit type is USE PARENT
          1. Go to check the credit type of parent merchant until found a DEFINITIVE merchant.
        参数:
        operatorId - The identifier of operator.
        merchantId - The identifier of leaf merchant.
        amount - The sale amount.
        gameId - calculate commission based on given game. If null, no need to calculate commission.
        isRestore - Does restore the credit level?
        isSaleStyle - Is the transaction which cause re-calculate of credit level is sale style, or payout style?? sale/cancel is sale style, payout/reversal(or its corresponding cancel by transaction) is payment style.
        isSoldByCreditCard - whether the sale is paid by credit card. only function for sale.
        返回:
        whose balance has been updated? either operator or merchant(if credit type of operator is use-parent). null will be returned if no balance updated.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - when encounter any business exception.

      • credit

        java.lang.Object credit(java.lang.String operatorId,
                      long merchantId,
                      java.math.BigDecimal amount,
                      boolean isRestore,
                      boolean isSaleStyle)
                        throws ApplicationException
        已过时。 Will be removed soon, replaced by BalanceService and CommissionBalanceService *
        A alternate method for credit update. If the transaction which will affect credit level has no relationship with game, such as cashout, call this method then.
        参数:
        operatorId - Update which operator's balance.
        merchantId - The merchant who contains the given operator.
        amount - The amount which will be applied to current sale or payout balance.
        isRestore - topup the sale/payout balance if true, deduct if false.
        isSaleStyle - operator on sale balance if true, otherwise on payout balance.
        返回:
        whose balance has been updated? either operator or merchant(if credit type of operator is use-parent).null will be returned if no balance updated.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException

      • credit

        java.lang.Object credit(java.lang.String operatorId,
                      long merchantId,
                      java.math.BigDecimal amount,
                      java.lang.String gameId,
                      boolean isRestore,
                      boolean isSaleStyle,
                      boolean isSoldByCreditCard,
                      Transaction transaction)
                        throws ApplicationException
        A alternate method for credit update. If the transaction which will affect credit level has no relationship with game, such as cashout, call this method then.
        参数:
        operatorId - Update which operator's balance.
        merchantId - The merchant who contains the given operator.
        amount - The amount which will be applied to current sale or payout balance.
        isRestore - topup the sale/payout balance if true, deduct if false.
        isSaleStyle - operator on sale balance if true, otherwise on payout balance.
        transaction - te transaction
        返回:
        whose balance has been updated? either operator or merchant(if credit type of operator is use-parent).null will be returned if no balance updated.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException

      • transferCredit

        CreditTransferDto transferCredit(Context reqCtx,
                               Context respCtx,
                               CreditTransferDto dto)
                                 throws ApplicationException
        There are 2 kinds of credit: sale and payout. Sale and its corresponding cancellation will affect sale credit, payout/validation and its corresponding cancellation will affect payout credit.

        Refer to credit(String, long, BigDecimal, String, boolean, boolean, boolean) for more information.

        抛出:
        ApplicationException

      • topupOperator

        OperatorTopupDto topupOperator(Context respCtx,
                             OperatorTopupDto topupDto)
                               throws ApplicationException
        Topup the sale balance of given operator. If the credit type of operator is 'use-parent', system will lookup its parent till find a merchant whose credit type is definitive value.
        参数:
        respCtx - The context of current topup transaction.
        topupDto - The topup request, the field 'amount' must be provided. If no field 'operatorId' provided, system will retrieve operator from 'X-Operator-Id'.
        返回:
        The balance of the operator or merchant whose sale balance has been topuped.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - when encounter biz exception.
